GSD.description:
vfio/type1: Unpin zero pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.68 by commit 5321908ef74fb593e0dbc8737d25038fc86c9986. For more details please see the references link.
